plugins.name: 一键翻译元素 Quick Translate
plugins.description:
Introduction

Quick Translate is a Figma plugin designed to help you instantly translate selected text elements into different languages with just one click. Save time and improve your workflow by translating text directly within your design files.


Function Description

  1. Translate selected text elements into a specified target language.
  2. Supports multiple languages and automatic translation of all text layers in a Figma selection.
  3. Easy-to-use interface to select languages and apply translations quickly.
  4. Ideal for designers working on multilingual projects or collaborating with global teams.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more text elements in your Figma file.
  2. Open the plugin from the "Plugins" menu.
  3. Choose the target language for translation.
  4. Click the "Translate" button, and the selected text will be replaced with the translated version.


Notes

  1. Ensure your Figma selection includes text elements, as the plugin only works with text layers.
  2. The translation may vary depending on the accuracy of the API and the language selected.
  3. For optimal results, select only relevant text elements to avoid unnecessary API calls.


介绍

Quick Translate 是一款 Figma 插件，旨在帮助您一键翻译选中的文本元素。通过该插件，您可以直接在 Figma 文件中将文本翻译为不同语言，节省时间，提高工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文本元素翻译为指定的目标语言。
  2. 支持多种语言，并自动翻译 Figma 选择中的所有文本图层。
  3. 提供简单易用的界面，可以快速选择语言并应用翻译。
  4. 适用于多语言项目的设计师，或者与全球团队协作的设计师。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个文本元素。
  2. 从“插件”菜单打开插件。
  3. 选择目标翻译语言。
  4. 点击“翻译”按钮，选中的文本将被翻译并替换。


注意事项

  1. 请确保您的 Figma 选择包含文本元素，因为插件只支持文本图层。
  2. 翻译效果可能会根据 API 的准确性和所选语言有所不同。
  3. 为了获得最佳效果，建议只选择相关的文本元素，以避免不必要的 API 请求。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quick Translate: Instant Translation for Figma Elements

plugins.name: Invoicely
plugins.description:
Create clean, professional invoices directly inside Figma — no extra tools needed.


Invoicely lets freelancers, designers, and agencies generate stylish invoices in seconds with pre-built templates, client autofill.


✦ Select a template

✦ Add your client and items

✦ Hit “Generate Invoice” — done.


Built for speed. Designed for simplicity.

accepted.name: Diego Grillo
accepted.description:
I like building things that people use.
Mostly simple, useful, sometimes weird.
Currently shipping plugins, tools & ideas.

plugins.tagline: Quick Invoice Maker for Figma

137998.name: Invoicely
137998.description:
Create clean, professional invoices directly inside Figma — no extra tools needed.


Invoicely lets freelancers, designers, and agencies generate stylish invoices in seconds with pre-built templates, client autofill.


✦ Select a template

✦ Add your client and items

✦ Hit “Generate Invoice” — done.


Built for speed. Designed for simplicity.
137998.release_notes:
This is the first public release of Invoicely.

✔️ All core features are working:

Template selection

Client & sender input

Tax customization

Instant invoice generation

Fully editable directly in Figma

⚠️ Minor note:
Some alignments in the invoice template aren’t pixel-perfect yet.
We wanted to ship early and improve fast — updates are already planned to polish everything.

Stay tuned for more features and improvements coming soon!

plugins.name: Grid Forge - Create Tables using your Design System
plugins.description:
Grid Forge is a powerful Figma plugin that revolutionizes table creation by using your existing design system components. With intelligent auto layout, flexible width settings, and advanced data mapping, Grid Forge helps teams create responsive, consistent tables in seconds.


Use your own header and cell components, ensuring brand and Ul consistency. Configure columns with FIXED, HUG (with minimum width), or FILL modes, and instantly preview changes in

real-time.


Import data via CSV or Excel, map multiple fields per component, and watch as Grid Forge intelligently applies your design system to every table row saving time and maintaining design integrity across complex Uls like dashboards and forms.
plugins.tagline: Create responsive tables using your design system components, auto layout, and real data

plugins.name: Bulk Text Replacer
plugins.description:
CSV形式のファイルを読み込んで一括置換できます。

1列目に検索対象、2列目に置換内容を記述したCSVファイルを読み込ませて使用して下さい。


手入力で「検索する言葉」と「置換する言葉」の間に「=>」を入れることでも可能です。

例：検索する言葉 => 置換する言葉


You can perform bulk text replacement by importing a CSV file.

The first column should contain the text to search for, and the second column should contain the replacement text.


Alternatively, you can manually enter replacement pairs using the => format.

Example: original text => replacement text
plugins.tagline: Bulk text replacement for Figma, Figjam & Slides.

137797.description:

例：検索する言葉 => 置換する言葉


You can perform bulk text replacement by importing a CSV file.

The first column should contain the text to search for, and the second column should contain the replacement text.

Example: original text => replacement text
137797.release_notes:
検出されなかったテキストを一覧表示し、CSV形式で書き出せるようにしました。
Unmatched texts can now be viewed in a list and exported as a CSV file.
137797.tagline: Bulk text replacement for Figma, Figjam & Slides.

plugins.name: Color Variable Binder
plugins.description:
1. Suitable for copying layer fill, stroke variables, and color style with the same name replacement.

2. Suitable for replacing the same named solid color variable for copying layer effects.

3. The copied color style is internally bound to the same named solid color and gradient color variables, as well as the color variables within the gradient color.


1.适用于复制图层fill、stroke的变量、color style同名替换。

2.适用于复制图层effects的同名纯色变量替换。

3.复制的color style内部绑定同名纯色、渐变色变量，渐变色内部的颜色变量。

plugins.name: Component State Mapper
plugins.description:
Tired of getting lost in complex component variants? Struggling to track every possible state, prevent design inconsistencies, and explain component logic to your team?


Introducing State Mapper, the essential Figma plugin that transforms your complex component sets into clear, interactive, and easy-to-understand visual maps. Stop navigating your variants blindfolded and gain a bird's-eye view of your entire component architecture.


With a single click, State Mapper instantly generates a live flowchart of all your variants, showing you exactly how they connect and what properties change between them.


Key Features:


  2. 🗺️ Instant Visual Mapping: Automatically generate beautiful, easy-to-read diagrams from any component set. See the full picture, from simple buttons to complex data tables.
  3. 🔬 Powerful Filtering & Layouts: Is your map too complex? No problem. Isolate exactly what you need by filtering properties and values. Switch between Hierarchical, Graph, and Matrix layouts to find the perfect view.
  4. ⚠️ Smart "Missing State" Detection: Our most powerful feature! State Mapper intelligently analyzes your component's properties and automatically flags potential "holes" or missing variants in your system, helping you prevent bugs before they happen.
  5. 🤝 Seamless Handoff & Documentation: Export your component maps as SVG or PNG to include them directly in your documentation on Confluence, Notion, or Jira. Make sure developers understand the logic perfectly.
  6. 🔄 Live Sync: Keep your map updated in real-time. As you add, remove, or change variants, your map reflects those changes instantly.

Who is it for?


State Mapper is built for meticulous Product Designers, UI/UX Designers, and Design System teams who want to build more robust, error-free, and well-documented components.


Install State Mapper today and bring order, clarity, and intelligence to your design system!
plugins.tagline: Bring clarity to component chaos.

plugins.name: Figma to Unity Exporter
plugins.description:
### Tired of manually recreating your Figma designs in Unity?


Figma To Unity Importer is the ultimate workflow solution designed to bridge the gap between designers and developers. Stop wasting hours meticulously rebuilding UI and start converting your high-fidelity Figma designs into fully functional, native Unity uGUI components with just a few clicks.


**⚠️ IMPORTANT: This is one half of a powerful 2-part system.**

This Figma plugin exports your design data. To bring your designs to life in Unity, you need the professional importer asset from the Unity Asset Store.


---


### **➡️ Step 1: Get the Professional Unity Importer Asset**


To complete the workflow, please purchase and import the required companion asset from the Unity Asset Store. It's the engine that powers the entire import process in Unity, packed with advanced features to ensure a perfect conversion.


**[>> Get "Figma To Unity Importer" on the Unity Asset Store ($15) <<](https://assetstore.unity.com/preview/323342/1075296)**


---


### **✨ Key Features:**


* **Accurate Conversion:** Preserves layer hierarchy, names, positions, sizes, and rotations.

* **Advanced Text Support:** Exports text as TextMeshPro components, maintaining font family, **font weight (including variable fonts)**, size, and color.

* **Image Export:** Automatically exports image fills and creates native Unity `Image` components.

* **Resolution Scaling:** Scale your entire UI to different screen sizes automatically.

* **Smart & Simple UI:** Remembers your last used settings and supports multiple languages.


### **🚀 Workflow:**


**1. In Unity (Setup):**

* Purchase and import the importer from the Asset Store using the link above.

* Install the required packages as described in the asset's documentation (TextMeshPro, UI, Newtonsoft.Json).


**2. In Figma (Export):**

* Run this plugin.

* Select the single, top-level Frame you want to export.

* Configure your options (target resolution, include images, etc.).

* Click "Export" to download the `.zip` file.


**3. In Unity (Import):**

* Unzip the downloaded file.

* Drag the `FigmaExport` folder into your Unity `Assets`.

* Open the importer via `Tools > Figma Importer`.

* Assign the `hierarchy.json` file and click "Create UI".


That's it! Your design is now a native, ready-to-use UI in Unity.
plugins.tagline: The ultimate workflow bridge. Go from Figma design to a working Unity UI in minutes.

plugins.name: Pixabay Avatars Library
plugins.description:
🌟 Discover the Pixabay Avatars Library Plugin for Figma!


Enhance your designs with a vast collection of unique avatars from Pixabay, all integrated directly into your Figma workspace! 🎨 Perfect for designers, marketers, and content creators looking to add a personal touch to their projects.

Key Features:


Extensive Library: Access thousands of diverse avatars to represent any character or persona. 👤

Easy Integration: Effortlessly search and insert avatars into your designs without leaving Figma. 🖱️

Customizable Options: Adjust styles and colors to perfectly match your brand identity! 🎨


Why Choose Pixabay Avatars Library?


Boost Engagement: Personalized avatars make your designs more relatable and engaging. 🌈

Save Time: Quickly find the perfect avatar without sifting through multiple resources. ⏱️

Free and Accessible: Enjoy high-quality avatars at no cost, making your projects budget-friendly. 💰


Transform your projects with the Pixabay Avatars Library—your ultimate tool for unique and engaging designs! 🌟

plugins.name: Flatten Wizard
plugins.description:
Flatten Wizard turns complex vector layers into clean, export-ready shapes with one click.


It merges overlapping paths, removes outlines, simplifies structure, and optionally subtracts shapes from each other — perfect for preparing icons and scalable UI assets.


🪄 Select your frames → Click “Make magic” → Flattened!
plugins.tagline: Automatically flattens vector shapes into clean, scalable results — perfect for export.

137676.name: Flatten Wizard
137676.description:
Flatten Wizard turns complex vector layers into clean, export-ready shapes with one click.


It merges overlapping paths, removes outlines, simplifies structure, and optionally subtracts shapes from each other — perfect for preparing icons and scalable UI assets.


🪄 Select your frames → Click “Make magic” → Flattened!
137676.tagline: Automatically flattens vector shapes into clean, scalable results — perfect for export.

plugins.name: Tint & Shade Generator
plugins.description:
Quickly generate a color palette from any given color directly inside Figma. Choose how many shades and tints you'd like to generate — the plugin dynamically creates balanced variations optimized for both light and dark mode interfaces.


Each color swatch is clearly labeled for readability. Perfect for building design systems, theming user interfaces, or exploring creative color variations.


Simple, clean, and efficient — made for everyday design workflows.
plugins.tagline: Generate a full color palette from any color with clear labels, supporting light and dark modes.

137104.name: Tint & Shade Generator
137104.description:
Quickly generate a color palette from any given color directly inside Figma. Choose how many shades and tints you'd like to generate — the plugin dynamically creates balanced variations optimized for both light and dark mode interfaces.


Each color swatch is clearly labeled for readability. Perfect for building design systems, theming user interfaces, or exploring creative color variations.


Simple, clean, and efficient — made for everyday design workflows.
137104.tagline: Generate a full color palette from any color with clear labels, supporting light and dark modes.

plugins.name: FREE QR Code Generator
plugins.description:
Create QR codes without leaving Figma. Simply enter a URL or any text, generate a preview, and insert the QR code as an image onto your design canvas. Perfect for designers adding quick links, app downloads, or promotional codes to mockups and prototypes.


Features:

Preview QR code before inserting


Insert high-quality QR code image directly into your Figma file


Simple and sleek UI designed for ease of use

plugins.name: Flow Linker
plugins.description:
In large-scale design projects, prototyping every screen-to-screen interaction isn’t always practical. With dozens or even hundreds of screens, building interactive flows becomes time-consuming and sometimes infeasible, especially when deadlines are tight or priorities shift.


Yet developers and stakeholders still need clarity. They rely on understanding how different screens connect, what the logical flow of a user journey looks like, and where transitions happen even without full prototypes.


That’s where Flow Link comes in.


Rather than investing hours in building out detailed prototypes, Flow Link lets you visually map out interactions using clean, orthogonal connectors. These lines don’t just show flow—they’re configurable, styled, navigable, and reusable. And with frame linking, viewers can even jump directly to connected screens, making your Figma file interactive in structure, even without full prototyping.


Flow Link fills the gap between rapid design iteration and clear developer handoff making complex projects more navigable, understandable, and scalable.
plugins.tagline: Your Figma Flow, Made Effortless.

plugins.name: Iconize
plugins.description:
Transform any Figma design into a complete set of perfectly scaled Chrome extension icons in seconds.


Benefits:

  1. Save hours of manual work - No more tedious resizing and exporting
  2. Perfect proportions - Maintains design integrity across all sizes
  3. Professional results - Vector paths, text, and effects scale beautifully
  4. Chrome extension ready - Standard sizes (16px, 24px, 36px, 48px, 128px)
  5. Batch processing - Handle multiple designs simultaneously


How to use:

  1. Select your design - Choose any frame, group, component, or instance
  2. Run Iconize - Go to Plugins → Iconize → Scale to Icon Sizes
  3. Get your icons - Five perfectly scaled versions appear instantly
  4. Export to PNG / SVG and use - Icons are named icon16, icon24, icon36, icon48, icon128


Perfect for Chrome extensions, web apps, mobile apps, and any project requiring multiple icon sizes. Works with complex designs including vectors, text, effects, and nested elements.

accepted.name: George Valdes
accepted.description:
Post-architect
I like building, marketing, and selling outcomes

Iconize - Figma Plugin
Zenfiller - Auto Form filler
Zensets - Context engine

plugins.tagline: Instantly generate size appropriate icons at 16px, 24px, 36px, 48px & 128px from any design

plugins.name: ui-palette-generator
plugins.description:
Supply a primary color and the plugin will generate accessible light and dark themed ui color palettes. Each palette includes:


Palette

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary (primary analogous, complementary, split compliment left, or split compliment right)
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Background

  1. z0
  2. z1
  3. z2
  4. z3
  5. z4
  6. z5


Palette hover

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Text

  1. base (either #000 or #fff)
  2. light (base @ 75% opacity)
  3. lighter (base @ 50% opacity)
  4. lightest (base @ 33% opacity)


Text on palette

  1. textBaseOnPrimary
  2. textLightOnPrimary
  3. textLighterOnPrimary
  4. textLightestOnPrimary
  5. etc


Clicking "Add to document" will add both the light and dark themes as variable modes. If you're using the free plan, only the selected theme is added.


The plugin UI provides a live preview of the generated palettes in use.
plugins.tagline: Generate accessible light and dark themed ui color palettes

plugins.name: Human Design Map Builder
plugins.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps inside Figma.

It reads structured data from a frame called INPUT_PANEL and dynamically updates the cover, highlights centers, colors gates, and reveals matching sections based on the data.

It ends by copying all relevant sections to a target page (מפות מעודכנות) for final output.

No data is sent to external services, except for a success/failure status posted to a webhook for internal workflow tracking.

This plugin is tailored for a specific document structure and may not function properly outside that context.
plugins.tagline: Automatically build and assemble custom sections inside your Figma based on predefined data fields.

MAP BUILDER – Version 1.1
Release Notes

Added secure status reporting using dynamic tokens pulled directly from the design panel.

Improved user feedback with clearer notifications throughout the map-building process.

Minor bug fixes and internal stability enhancements.
137361.tagline: Automatically build and assemble custom sections inside your Figma based on predefined data fields.

plugins.name: Lazer
plugins.description:
Lazer is a plugin for Figma that provides quick commands to adjust the layout and appearance properties of selected elements. It is somewhat opinionated.


The idea is to leave the keyboard less by creating pseudo shortcuts. By bringing up the Actions input with command + K or command + / and then typing a short code (eg. w.h), the fuzzy search will bring your focus to an action you can execute by pressing enter.


I used Gemini 2.5 Pro to build this.


Features

This plugin allows you to quickly adjust:


Width & Height

w.h - Set Width to Hug

h.h - Set Height to Hug

w.f - Set Width to Fill

h.f - Set Height to Fill

w.. - Set Width (prompts for custom value)

h.. - Set Height (prompts for custom value)


Padding

p.0 - Set All Padding to 0

p.16 - Set All Padding to 16

p.. - Set Padding (prompts for custom value)


Auto Layout

al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment (opens alignment UI)

al.h - Set Auto Layout to Horizontal

al.v - Set Auto Layout to Vertical

g.0 - Set Gap to 0

g.8 - Set Gap to 8

g.16 - Set Gap to 16

g.. - Set Gap (prompts for custom value)


Border Radius

br.0 - Set Border Radius to 0px

br.8 - Set Border Radius to 8px

br.. - Set Border Radius (prompts for custom value)


Stroke

s.0 - Set Stroke Width to 0

s.1 - Set Stroke Width to 1

sw.. - Set Stroke Width (prompts for custom value)

sc.. - Set Stroke Colour (prompts for custom value)


Fill

f.1 - Add White Fill

f.0 - Remove All Fills

f.. - Set Fill Colour (prompts for custom value)


Text

ls.. - Set Text Letter Spacing (prompts for custom value)

t.s - Set Text Size (prompts for custom value)


General

help! - Show Commands and Shortcuts (displays this list in a popup)


Usage

  1. Open the Actions input with command + K or command + /
  2. Type the short code for the command (eg. w.h)
  3. Press enter (assuming you have your desired command in focus)


* Many commands apply adjustments directly (e.g., w.h - Set Width to Hug).

* The al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment command will open a dialog for visual alignment selection.

* Commands ending with .. (e.g., p.. - Set Padding) will prompt you to enter a custom value.
plugins.tagline: Shortcuts as quick actions to help you Figma faster

plugins.name: Zephyr Export
plugins.description: Exports a section with all its images as an atlas to the Defold engine. Before exporting, it wraps images into frames, all existing frames into components, adds TYPE TYPE_BOX property to all components and sets constraints scale (scale is not set if stretch is set). After that you can use your components in the zephyr plugin
plugins.tagline: Figma to defold atlas exporter

135215.name: Zephyr Export
135215.description: Exports a section with all its images as an atlas to the Defold engine. Before exporting, it wraps images into frames, all existing frames into components, adds TYPE TYPE_BOX property to all components and sets constraints scale (scale is not set if stretch is set). After that you can use your components in the zephyr plugin

plugins.name: Extractor
plugins.description:
Components as you go.


As you design, systems, patterns, and components naturally emerge. With Extractor, you can select your working frames, instantly extract them to a component, and automatically replace the original selection with a component instance.


This approach lets you focus on the details while future-proofing designs and aligning process more closely with development.


Simply select your frames and access the "Extract Component" command using CMD + P.


Feedback form →
plugins.tagline: Components as you go

135192.name: Extractor
135192.description:
Components as you go.


As you design, systems, patterns, and components naturally emerge. With Extractor, you can select your working frames, instantly extract them to a component, and automatically replace the original selection with a component instance.


This approach lets you focus on the details while future-proofing designs and aligning process more closely with development.


Simply select your frames and access the "Extract Component" command using CMD + P.


Feedback form →

plugins.name: JSON to Variable
plugins.description:
You can import a JSON file to create grouped Figma variables. you can download the pre-structured Tailwind color palette JSON file via the link as a starting point:


Tailwind colors structured.json


The following is an example of a correctly formatted JSON:

[
{
"CollectionName": {
"modes": {
"ModeName": {
"GroupName": {
"Primary": {
"$value": "#FFFFFF",
"$type": "color"
},

"secondary": {
"$value": "#F5F5F5",
"$type": "color"
}
},
"GroupName2": {
"primary": {
"$value": "#2196F3",
"$type": "color"
}
}
}
}
}
}
]
plugins.tagline: Import JSON file to variable

plugins.name: Bangalicon
plugins.description:
🔥 Bangalicon - The First Icon Plugin You Will Ever Need For Figma


Now, with a new Plugin of Bangalicon, you can get more than 500 high-quality SVG icons right in your Figma workflow. Bangalicons' curated collection of beautifully crafted icons spanning interfaces, communication, business, media, and more is at your fingertips now. It has been meticulously designed for speed, flexibility, and pixel perfection.


✨ Key Features:


500+ icons: Scalable and diverse as per the requirement.


Live Preview & Insert: You can browse, search, and without leaving Figma, icons can be inserted seamlessly which saves time.


Category-based filtering: Finding what you want is made easier because of organized categories.


Will Bangalicon work on IOS apps? Yes. Whether it is website designing or mobile marketing visuals, Bangalicon for Figma is guaranteed to raise your level of design visually in an instant.


⚡️ Save time and design better with Bangalicon.
plugins.tagline: The world of most creative icons

plugins.name: Back & Forward
plugins.description:
Navigate between Figma pages with the simplicity of a browser.

This plugin adds Back and Forward buttons to let you jump to previously visited pages in your file. Perfect for complex workflows, design reviews, and faster navigation across multi-page documents.


No more hunting through the page list. Just click and go!
plugins.tagline: Browser-style navigation for your Figma pages.

No more hunting through the page list. Just click and go!
134131.tagline: Browser-style navigation for your Figma pages.

plugins.name: Nativ Localization
plugins.description: The Nativ Localization plugin allows you to adapt visual content inside Figma to any culture and language (from any culture or language). This includes context-aware translation of editable text inside visual assets, as well as uneditable text that are part of complex pixel arts. The plugin allows you to upload your own glossary enabling you to control translation styles/tones. The translations automatically maintain the same original style in the target culture/language. The plugin also goes beyond text, such as stylistically replacing country flags in a poster based on the localization target.
plugins.tagline: Transform visual assets to any culture and language.

135216.name: Nativ Localization
135216.description: The Nativ Localization plugin allows you to adapt visual content inside Figma to any culture and language (from any culture or language). This includes context-aware translation of editable text inside visual assets, as well as uneditable text that are part of complex pixel arts. The plugin allows you to upload your own glossary enabling you to control translation styles/tones. The translations automatically maintain the same original style in the target culture/language. The plugin also goes beyond text, such as stylistically replacing country flags in a poster based on the localization target.
135216.release_notes: Added authentication to the Nativ platform
135216.tagline: Transform visual assets to any culture and language.

plugins.name: BrowserLens
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you import color styles from the BrowserLens web extension. Insert colors as layers in your design and add palettes to your local styles.


Learn more about BrowserLens: https://browserlens.com/

Documentation: https://docs.browserlens.com/


How to Use

  1. Open any webpage with the BrowserLens extension.
  2. Click export > Figma (BrowserLens Plugin).
  3. Download the style file for Figma.
  4. Run this plugin and upload the style file.
  5. Choose whether to add colors as local styles.
  6. Click 'Import Styles'.


About BrowserLens


BrowserLens is a web extension designed to extract styling and seo information from any webpage without the need for developer tools. It provides a simple UI for extracting and copying webpage information from the current tab.


Extension Features

  1. ⌨️ View fonts used on a webpage and the associated CSS values.
  2. 🖌️ Extract colors from a webpage and click to copy color value.
  3. 🌅 Extract gradients from a webpage and click to copy CSS value.
  4. 🎨 Export color palettes to Figma.
  5. 🌐 Preview SEO data including page meta, OpenGraph tags and Twitter Card data.
  6. ✅ Check SEO meta for best practices including title and description length.
  7. 🖼️ List all images present on a page and click to download, including background images.
  8. 🌃 Dark mode support.

accepted.name: BrowserLens
accepted.description:
Extract colors, fonts, media and seo meta from any site without using developer tools. 

Available for Chrome, Firefox and Edge

plugins.tagline: Import styles from the BrowserLens web extension

plugins.name: QR Code Automation
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to update / replace all QR codes in your Figma file with just one click! You have the total control over sizes, and Color!


How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)
  3. Create one or multiple rectangles (squares) and name them "QR-Code".
  4. Create a second text layer
  5. Name the text layer "QR-color", and add the Hex code of the color you want your QR-Code to have inside the text layer.
  6. Run the Plugin


The plugin will generate a QR code using the content from the "QR-Link" text layer. It will place the QR code over each rectangle named "QR-Code" and match the dimensions of the rectangle. If the rectangle is inside a frame, the QR code will be placed inside that frame as well.


If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.


Hint:

  1. It's not a problem if there are multiple text layers named "QR-Link" — just make sure that all of them contain the exact same text content. Otherwise, the plugin will not run.
  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
plugins.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

134125.name: QR Code Automation
134125.description:

  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)

  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
134125.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

plugins.name: Email Name Generator
plugins.description:
Easily generate realistic and culturally diverse names right inside Figma. NameGen Africa helps designers and developers populate mockups with random African and global names—perfect for UI/UX projects, user flows, and form demos.


Features:


Generate random names with authentic African and international options

Choose between first name only or first and last name (separated by a period: john.doe)

Select email type: corporate (e.g., john.doe@company.com) or personal (e.g., john.doe@gmail.com)


Instantly fill text fields or use in prototyping workflows


Perfect for creating inclusive and realistic user data with just a few clicks!

accepted.name: Joseph Kalu
accepted.description: I am a fintech and crypto product designer

plugins.tagline: Generate random email names for your project

plugins.name: SheetSync For DeSo
plugins.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Google Sheets to Figma Design Variations


SheetSync is a powerful Figma plugin that creates design variations directly from your Google Sheets data, saving you hours of repetitive work. Perfect for generating product catalogs, social media posts, campaign assets, and more.


With SheetSync, simply select a template frame, connect your Google Sheet, and watch as the plugin automatically generates variations with customized text and images. Text fields with "#" prefixes automatically populate from your sheet's columns, while image placeholders update with URLs from your data.


Key Features:

• Generate dozens of design variations in seconds

• Dynamic text population from spreadsheet data

• Automatic image placement from URL sources

• Simple template setup with intuitive naming conventions

• Manual image upload option for greater flexibility


Streamline your design workflow and ensure consistency across all your variations with SheetSync For DeSo.
plugins.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

138200.name: SheetSync For DeSo
138200.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Google Sheets to Figma Design Variations


SheetSync is a powerful Figma plugin that creates design variations directly from your Google Sheets data, saving you hours of repetitive work. Perfect for generating product catalogs, social media posts, campaign assets, and more.


With SheetSync, simply select a template frame, connect your Google Sheet, and watch as the plugin automatically generates variations with customized text and images. Text fields with "#" prefixes automatically populate from your sheet's columns, while image placeholders update with URLs from your data.


Key Features:

• Generate dozens of design variations in seconds

• Dynamic text population from spreadsheet data

• Automatic image placement from URL sources

• Simple template setup with intuitive naming conventions

Streamline your design workflow and ensure consistency across all your variations with SheetSync For DeSo.

138200.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

plugins.name: push-my-icons
plugins.description:
Push your Figma SVG icons to GitHub with ease.


This plugin helps you

  1. Automatically extract SVG nodes
  2. Upload them to your GitHub repository
  3. Generate a pull request with added/updated/removed icons


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin and fill in the following fields:
  2. GitHub personal access token
  3. GitHub repository URL
  4. Target folder path in the repo (e.g., src/icons)
  5. Pull request title and description
  6. Select all frames that contain your SVG icon components.
  7. Each selected frame should be a top-level container for one or more SVGs.
  8. Click "Push" button.
  9. The plugin will:
  10. Export all SVGs found in the selected frames
  11. Upload them to the specified folder in your GitHub repo
  12. Create a pull request containing added, updated, or deleted icon files
plugins.tagline: Push selected Figma icons to GitHub in one click.
